scripts.watch: ls *.js languages/*.js | entr browserifyinc -vd github.js -o dist/full.js
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && browserifyinc github.js --outfile dist/full.js && cp background.js dist/
scripts.pack: rm -fr tmp/ && npm run build && mkdir -p tmp && cp -r dist vendor tmp/ && cp icon128.png icon64.png icon48.png icon16.png manifest.json options.html options.js links.css tmp/ && cd tmp/ && zip -r archive * && mv archive.zip ../ && cd ..
